original_title: Fatal train collisions lead to deaths
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A collision was reported between a motorcycle and a train, traveling from Colombo to Jaffna, In Meesalai, Chavakachcheri. The incident claimed the life of a 72-year-old resident of Chavakachcheri.
Similarly, at another unprotected crossing in Waraddana, a collision between a lorry and a train resulted in the death of a 38-year-old resident of Narammala, while two others sustained injuries.
